Title: Universe
Description:
['Under the night sky feebly illuminated by innumerable twinkling stars, a little girl wanders alone through a magic world between darkness and dawan, that is not today and not tomorrow, inhabited by 6 billion solitudes. What will she encounter in this solitary night journey?', '
', '
', '
', "
Music video for Maaya Sakamoto's song Universe, created by Production I.G."]
Related: ['Sequel: Yin Yang Shi: Ping An Wu Yu 2nd Season', 'Other: Onmyou Hyakki Monogatari']
